data.name: Factory Balls
data.detailed_description:
You might think that working on a conveyor belt is tedious work, but not so if you're manufacturing Factory Balls!
Your job in this puzzle game is to custom craft each ball to a specific order. You've got all the tools you need to fulfill each order... except the instruction manual.

You might remember the Factory Balls flash browser games, well the classic logical puzzle game is back! Same developer, new design, new balls, new tools and loads of levels!

In each level, you'll see the target design of your ball on the shipping box. Starting from a plain white ball get to work matching the design by tapping the tools you want to use. For example, the target ball might be orange with white eyes and black pupils, which means you need to use two sets of goggles to block the paint and create the different patterns. Pulling a few times with a pair of pliers might result in a hefty beak.

There is no time limit or punishment for making incorrect moves, so you can try several different configurations to feel your way to success.
If you thrive on a cerebral challenge and are keen for a mental workout, you should find Factory Balls to be just the ticket!

  • 221 unique levels
  • refreshingly tricky puzzles
  • 5 standard level packs
  • extra halloween themed level pack
